job_tasks.phrase: develops large language models from scratch
job_tasks.justification: Developing models from scratch directly falls under the core definition of the Modeling task category.
Researching and advancing models is a key aspect of the Modeling task, particularly in the context of generative AI.
Building 'AI-powered experiences' implies the development of software systems that integrate AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: unlock new work experiences in the future
job_tasks.justification: This phrase suggests the creation of new applications or systems that enable these future work experiences.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible development of general-purpose AI models
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development of AI models that are then integrated into software systems, with a focus on responsibility.
This relates to the software development lifecycle and ensuring ethical considerations are integrated.
Data governance is a key component of responsible AI development and operations, ensuring data integrity and compliance.

soft_skills.phrase: unlock new work experiences in the future

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and research of Large Language Models (LLMs) from scratch and the advancement of their responsible development. This aligns directly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's focus on generative models and building applications around them.
